en.title: **Integration** Engineer
en.text:
• Worked closely with customers and internal teams to define technical requirements, contributing to the creation of detailed project charters for codec integration projects.
  • Developed and maintained Bash and Python scripts to automate codec performance benchmarking, regression testing, and deployment processes, reducing manual testing time by 10%.
  • Designed and implemented automated validation frameworks, improving test coverage and ensuring compliance with industry standards such as MPEG-5 LCEVC.
  • Optimized codec integration with media processing pipelines, reducing latency by 20% and enhancing compatibility with video streaming platforms.
  • Customized and fine-tuned codec solutions for clients, addressing specific performance constraints and achieving up to 30% efficiency gains in compression and playback quality.

en.title: **Software** Engineer
en.text:
• Designed and implemented a simulation framework in ROS and Gazebo to generate synthetic sensor data, enabling extensive testing of navigation algorithms without physical hardware.
  • Optimized visual-inertial odometry and loop closure detection, reducing cumulative drift and enhancing long-term mapping stability.
  • Implemented deep learning-based object detection and multi-target tracking using OpenCV and TensorFlow, improving obstacle avoidance and path planning efficiency.
  • Developed and optimized SLAM algorithms using C++ and Python, improving real-time robotic navigation and reducing localization errors by 25%.

en.title: **Data Engineer** Engineer
en.text:
• Designed and optimized SQL databases to store and manage case data, improving query performance and retrieval speed by 15%.
  • Built and maintained ETL pipelines using SQL and Python, enabling the collection and transformation of abuse reports from multiple sources, including online surveys and helpline records.
  • Developed interactive dashboards in Tableau to visualize key metrics such as case trends, geographical distribution, and response times, aiding stakeholders in resource allocation.

en.title: **Software** Developer
en.text:
• Designed and maintained MySQL databases for web applications, optimizing queries and indexing to improve performance by 5%.
  • Developed and styled responsive web pages using HTML and CSS, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and accessibility compliance.
  • Assisted in back-end database management, writing complex SQL queries for data retrieval, updates, and report generation.
  • Debugged and resolved database and UI-related issues, improving website stability and user experience.

en.title: **Software** Engineer
en.text:
• Developed a nutrition-tracking web app using React, implementing features for meal logging, macro tracking, and interactive data visualization.
  • Built a car listing platform with React, integrating search filters, image uploads, and user authentication to enhance the buying and selling experience.
  • Designed and optimized ETL pipelines in Python and SQL to process large datasets, ensuring efficient data transformation and storage for client applications.
  • Created a food ordering system with a MySQL database, enabling real-time order tracking, inventory management, and reporting functionalities.
